colors.background_gradient: mesh gradient: purple #667EEA, coral #F093FB, blue #4FACFE, pink #F5576C

typography.headline: bold sans-serif, white #FFFFFF, strong presence
typography.accent_text: gradient text (purple to pink) or white on gradient

person.outfit_hook: modern minimalist dark clothing, tech/futuristic vibe
person.outfit_cta: sleek dark jacket OR modern minimalist top
person.lighting: dramatic colored lighting, rim lights in purple/blue/pink

decorations.elements: flowing gradient mesh blobs, 3D geometric shapes, floating orbs
decorations.3d_objects: glossy 3D spheres, cubes, abstract shapes with gradient materials
decorations.particles: glowing orbs, light trails, colorful bokeh

prompt_blocks.background: Background: dark base #1A1A2E with flowing gradient mesh. Colors: purple #667EEA, coral pink #F093FB, electric blue #4FACFE, magenta #F5576C. Organic flowing shapes blending into each other. Futuristic, vibrant, dynamic.
prompt_blocks.cards_content: Dark glassmorphism cards: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) with 25px blur. White border rgba(255,255,255,0.2). Colorful glow effect behind cards. Modern futuristic look. White text on dark glass.
prompt_blocks.cards_headline: Bold white text on gradient mesh background. OR gradient text (purple #667EEA to pink #F093FB). Strong presence. Modern geometric sans-serif. Glowing effect on text.
prompt_blocks.person_hook: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: modern minimalist dark clothing, futuristic tech vibe. Pose: [POSE]. Expression: [EMOTION], confident, modern. Lighting: dramatic colored rim lighting (purple, blue, pink edges). Dynamic shadows. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
prompt_blocks.person_cta: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: sleek dark jacket or modern minimalist top. Pose: confident gesture toward CTA. Expression: confident smile, approachable but edgy. Lighting: colorful rim lights, futuristic. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
prompt_blocks.decorations_hook: 3D elements: glossy spheres with gradient materials, floating geometric shapes (cubes, pyramids), glowing orbs. [PROPS] with futuristic/holographic treatment. Light trails and particles. Gradient mesh blobs floating.
prompt_blocks.cta_card: Dark glass card with colorful gradient glow behind it. White border. Top line (white): '–ü–ò–®–ò:'. Main line (HUGE, gradient purple-to-pink OR white with glow): '[PRODUCT_CODE]'. Floating 3D shapes and particles around. Holographic feel.
prompt_blocks.viral_elements: 3D paper airplane with gradient material and glow trail. Share icons as 3D glowing objects. Floating orbs and particles. Gradient mesh background. Button with gradient border: 'üíæ –°–û–•–†–ê–ù–ò'.
prompt_blocks.style_footer: STYLE: Photorealistic person, futuristic design elements. Vibrant gradient mesh aesthetic. Dramatic colored lighting. Modern tech editorial. 8K resolution.
